title: How It
description: Share content in four simple steps. No accounts, no complexity, just pure privacy.

steps.title: Create a Drop
steps.description: Type/paste text or code snippets. Everything is encrypted instantly on your device.

steps.title: Get Your Key
steps.description: Receive a memorable three-word key. Text it, say it out loud, or type it on your other deviceâ€”however you share is up to you.

steps.title: Unlock & Access
steps.description: Anyone with the key can open it on any device. Perfect for quick in-person handoffs or sharing with a group.

steps.title: Auto-Delete
steps.description: Choose one-time access for ultra-secure sharing, or keep it available for up to an hour. Either way, it vanishes completely.
